page.title: 12Holy Family High, Carlton
page.content: Holy Family School is situated between Snaith,Goole and Selby.The school opened in February l967.Mr K J Mulvihill is and has been the headmaster since the school opened. The school caters for 360 pupils,coming from Selby,Goole,Thorne and surrounding villages.It has 23 teachers of various subjects along with 6 non-teaching staff i.e. headmaster's secretary, librarian, matron,laboratory technician,caretaker and cook.The school is an ll-l6 year old mixed comprehensive school. Provided by the Roman Catholic Diocese of Leeds and maintained by North Yorkshire County Council for the education of pupils in the teachings and practices of the Roman Catholic Church.The motto of the school is "To increase in wisdom and in grace."
